name: StoicMe
0:
”Alexa, Stoic Me”
”Alexa, open Stoic Me and give me clarity”
”Alexa, give me wisdom with Stoic Me”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: stoic me
des:
Benefit from the wisdom and of the greatest of all practical philosophers. The clarity of purpose and meaning with which these men saw the world have propelled people to incredible heights, and in our bustling, busy and confusing modern world their insights have never been more powerful.

Taking a moment out of one's day to pursue this betterment and perspective is incredibly powerful. The clarity and wisdom of Stoicism has never been so salient, nor so accessible.

Say 'Alexa, Stoic Me', and see your world with new perspective.
